bullish: Total cloud revenue was up 33% at $8 billion
Cloud infrastructure revenue was $4.1 billion, up 66%
Oracle's cloud infrastructure businesses continue to grow much faster than competitors
Total revenues for the quarter were $16.1 billion, up 13%
Fusion ERP up 17%, Fusion SCM up 18%, Fusion HCM up 14%, NetSuite grew by 13%
Health care business has 274 customers live in production on clinical AI agent
AI-based ambulatory EHR is generally available and received US regulatory approval
Expect bookings and revenue in Q3 to accelerate materially
bearish: Free cash flow was a negative $10 billion
Currency had a 1% positive impact on revenue, and 3¢ positive impact on earnings in Q2
Currency is expected to have a 2-3% positive effect on revenue and 6¢ positive effect on EPS in Q3
risks: Risks and uncertainties that may cause actual results to differ materially from statements being made today

Ability to maintain investment-grade debt rating
Ability to deliver capacity to customers quickly and efficiently
